extendedInfo.description: Based on Singapore National Environment Agency (NEA) mobile weather service, Weather@SG, this application allows you to view the current weather in Singapore(general or specific location), next 3 hrs, 12 hrs and 3 days forecast. For use in Singapore only.v0.2Upgraded to 1.6 compatibility

reviews.comment: works like a charm. reflects exactly what it does on the nea\'s website which i rely heavily on(: moto-charm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very slow. But if you are patient, this is one of the best weather apps for Singapore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Those on starhub may experience lag when opening this app. There is nothing wrong with app, starhub is the problem. I got it fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can be better...if...
reviews.comment: Display size of the apps doesn\'t fit in full screen for Samsung note...it could be better if display on full screen mode....5 stars perhaps!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the best weather apps
reviews.comment: I like this app... the best part of this app is the forecast by area, which is useful to check the weather before u head towards a particular area. Just a suggestion, maybe can add an additional feature whereby user can set to be alerted for a particular weather at a particular area... confusing??? e.g. If I\'m heading from west side to East Coast for a picnic or BBQ... I would like to be alerted if the weather forecast change to raining, instead of keep checking on the forecast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads get in the way
reviews.comment: Nothing more than a summary of information from NEA\'s website   Good enough but ads are irritating sometimes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine!
reviews.comment: As above, no problems. Thought the select buttons were way too small, but strangely, have not made a wrong selection yet. Could be BIGGER though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice...
reviews.comment: great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Shows PSI, 3 day forecast, rain, temp.. It\'s like the nea website in app.form, which is basically as good as it gets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Think it will be perfect if can port water level information from NEA , given SG now so prone to flood . Can plan when to bring slippers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Appears to poll the data from nea web, formats it on it\'s own server, then sends it to me.. therefore laggy... otherwise, excellent app... :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'s show reading in Ferenheit, only up to 3 day forecast. Id rather uninstall for extra space.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Accurate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be better if the links are bigger and easier to \"touch\" on. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good idea but doesn\'t work on my Hero. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Better than all the other weather apps as it tells u in detail
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly, the 3 hrs forecast is what I needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works perfectly. A widget next?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: uninstalled since no updates. People do try SG Weather Cast app. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says, reasonably fast. Good.
reviews.author: A Google User
